word: The scientist's discovery was ___; it changed everything we knew about physics.
example: תשובה: revolutionary (= שינה את כל מה שידענו)

word: Despite the ___ weather, the hikers decided to continue their journey.
example: תשובה: treacherous (= מסוכן, מתאים לתנאי מזג אוויר קשים)

word: The CEO's ___ leadership style encouraged employees to share their ideas freely.
example: תשובה: inclusive (= עידד שיתוף ורעיונות חדשים)

word: The ancient ruins were so ___ that archaeologists spent decades studying them.
example: תשובה: enigmatic (= מסתורי, הצדיק עשורי מחקר)

word: Her ___ attitude toward failure helped her learn from every mistake.
example: תשובה: resilient (= למדה מכישלונות, לא נשברה)

word: The documentary presented a ___ view of the conflict, showing both sides equally.
example: תשובה: balanced (= הציג שני צדדים באופן שווה)

word: The new policy was met with ___ opposition from the local community.
example: תשובה: fierce (= התנגדות חזקה מהקהילה)

word: The professor's lecture was so ___ that students struggled to stay awake.
example: תשובה: monotonous (= גרם לתלמידים להתקשות להישאר ערים)

word: The charity's ___ efforts to feed the homeless were recognized with a national award.
example: תשובה: commendable (= זכה להכרה לאומית)

word: After years of ___ research, the team finally found a cure for the disease.
example: תשובה: rigorous (= מחקר יסודי וקפדני)

word: ABUNDANT means the same as:
example: Restatement: abundant ≈ plentiful (שניהם = הרבה מאוד)

word: CONCISE means the same as:
example: Restatement: concise ≈ brief (שניהם = קצר ולעניין)

word: DIMINISH means the same as:
example: Restatement: diminish ≈ decrease (שניהם = להפחית)

word: FACILITATE means the same as:
example: Restatement: facilitate ≈ make easier (שניהם = לאפשר/להקל)

word: INEVITABLE means the same as:
example: Restatement: inevitable ≈ unavoidable (שניהם = לא ניתן להימנע)

word: AMBIGUOUS means the same as:
definition: unclear / open to interpretation — לא ברור, דו-משמעי
example: Restatement: ambiguous ≈ unclear (שניהם = ניתן לפרש בדרכים שונות)

word: PROFOUND means the same as:
example: Restatement: profound ≈ deep (שניהם = בעל עומק ומשמעות)

word: SCRUTINIZE means the same as:
example: Restatement: scrutinize ≈ examine carefully (שניהם = לבדוק לעומק)

word: ALLEVIATE means the same as:
example: Restatement: alleviate ≈ relieve (שניהם = להפחית כאב/בעיה)

word: METICULOUS means the same as:
example: Restatement: meticulous ≈ very careful (שניהם = תשומת לב לפרטים)
